00056 class VTK_ESQUI_BIOMECHANICS_EXPORT vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface : public vtkDeformationModel
00057 {
00058 public:
00060     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface, vtkDeformationModel);
00062     static vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface* New();
00063     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface";};
00065     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00066 
00068     virtual int RequestData(vtkInformation *, vtkInformationVector **, vtkInformationVector *);
00069 
00071 
00083     virtual void Init();
00084 
00086     vtkSetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);
00088     vtkSetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);
00090     vtkSetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);
00092     vtkSetMacro(Mass, double);
00094     vtkSetMacro(DeltaT, double);
00096     vtkSetMacro(SolverType, vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType);
00097 
00099 
00104     virtual void AddDisplacement(vtkIdType pointId, double * vector);
00105 
00106 protected:
00107     vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface();
00108     ~vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface();
00109 
00110 
00112     vtkParticleSpringSystem * ParticleSpringSystem;
00113 
00114     // PSS specific parameters
00116     double DistanceCoefficient;
00118 
00124     double DampingCoefficient;
00126 
00129     double SpringCoefficient;
00131 
00135     double Mass;
00137 
00141     double DeltaT;
00142 
00144 
00151     vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType SolverType;
00152     
00153 private:
00154     vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface(const vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface&);  // Not implemented.
00155     void operator=(const vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface&);  // Not implemented.
00156 };
